question: Recently, NITI Aayog has entered into an MoU with which Union Territory to support its administration?
explanation:
In key move to promote development and improve the key infrastructure of the newly constituted Union Territory of Ladakh, an MoU has been signed between NITI Aayog and the UT of Ladakh, recently. By this MoU, NITI Aayog would support the UT’s administration through its initiative named D3S-i (i.e) ‘Development Support Services to States for Infrastructure Projects\'. 
The MoU has a focus on identification of priority projects and to ensure their faster implementation. A team of professionals is expected to be stationed at Ladakh for identification and development of tourism and infrastructure projects in the UT.
